common.request: Request for Back Track sent successfully

common.inputtool: Schedule Training Duration to conduct theory class and save to check the availability of Trainer (Theory).

common.contone: Attention: The available Assessor has already been assigned to another Centre, please select a different Assessment Date.
common.conttwo: Attention: The selected Assessor has already been assigned to another Centre, please select a different Assessor.
common.contthree: There are no IV/QA Staff available at your Centre
common.whoone: who were allocated to conduct the theory class have been assigned to another Batch. Please select a different Trainer.
common.notrailer: Attention: No Trainer Available on the selected Duration. Please check the availability of the Tutor and plan the Training.
common.attennotrail: Attention: No Trainer Available on the selected Duration. Please check the availability of the Tutor and plan the Training.
common.attennoasses: Attention: There is no Assessor available on the selected duration. Please check the availability of the Assessor and plan the Assessment.
common.attennoassesnew: The number of available Assessors for the selected duration is less than the required number. Please check the Assessors' availability and plan the Assessment accordingly.
common.attentime: Attention: There is no Assessor available on the selected Date and Time. Please select a different Date and Time.
common.doyouwant: Do you want to confirm submission of this Batch Creation?
common.doyoucancel: Do you want to cancel creating this Batch?
common.doyouwantlear: Do you want to notify the Learners that this Batch is Cancelled?
